title: Fitting the job to the worker: an introduction to ergonomics
creator_credit: David Cons, Frank A. Hoare, Merton Park and British Productivity Council
brief_description: An introduction to industrial ergonomics, a subject covering the study of all factors affecting the physical and psychological relationship between man and his artificial environment, including such factors as lighting, display, heat and sound, and age.
